column1: ,gil_bates,2012-05-22T15:19Z,Which books?  What kinds of thoughts?  A little bit of info would really be helpful.
,polemiko,2012-05-22T15:45Z,@gil_bates act u can find out about which or what 'content' if you click on the sum of 'Files' at the top info in this page...
Intro To Political Theory - An Essay by Leo Strauss.pdf
Hanna Arendt - Lectures on Kant's Political Philosophy.pdf
Political Thought - Cambridge Text/Community and Civil Society (Cambridge Texts in the History of Political Thought) - Ferdinand Tonnies.pdf
Political Thought - Cambridge Text/English Constitution (Cambridge Texts in the History of Political Thought) - Walter Bagehot.pdf
Political Thought - Cambridge Text/Defender of the Peace (Cambridge Texts in the History of Political Thought) - Marsilius of Padua.pdf
Political Thought - Cambridge Text/Political Writings (Cambridge Texts in the History of Political Thought) - Thomas Jefferson.pdf
The primacy of the political - a history of political thought from the Greeks to the French.pdf
A Companion to Contemporary Political Philosophy~ 2 Volume Set - Wiley.pdf
Gaus and Kukathas (eds) - Handbook Political Theory - 2004.pdf
Political Thought - Cambridge Text/On the Genealogy of Morality (Cambridge Texts in the History of Political Thought) - Friedrich Nietzsche.pdf
Political Thought - Cambridge Text/Federalist with Letters of Brutus (Cambridge Texts in the History of Political Thought) - Hamilton, Madison, Jay.pdf
Political Thought - Cambridge Text/Autobiography and Other Writings (Cambridge Texts in the History of Political Thought) - Thomas Jefferson.pdf
Political Thought - Cambridge Text/Political Writings (Cambridge Texts in the History of Political Thought) - Pierre Bayle.pdf
Political Thought - Cambridge Text/First New Science (Cambridge Texts in the History of Political Thought) - Giambattista Vico.pdf
Political Thought - Cambridge Text/Reflections on Violence (Cambridge Texts in the History of Political Thought) - Georges Sorel.pdf
Political Philosophy A Very Short Introduction - (2003).pdf
Political Thought - Cambridge Text/Political Writings (Cambridge Texts in the History of Political Thought) - Augustine.pdf
Political Thought - Cambridge Text/On the Commonwealth and On the Laws (Cambridge Texts in the History of Political Thought) - Cicero.pdf

,mantikor777,2012-05-23T01:09Z,gil_bates, all you need to do is click on the number after ""Files:"" at the top of the torrent information.  It will show all the files that are included in the download and polemiko would not have to go to the extra effort."
